titles.title: A concurrent resolution declaring the support of the Congress for continuation of civil land remote-sensing activities, for the benefit of all mankind, through the continuation and commercialization of the existing Landsat program.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary: 7/23/1987--Introduced. Declares that the United States should promote and support the continuation of civil land remote-sensing activities for the benefit of all mankind. Declares that these activities can best be achieved through continuation and commercialization of the existing Landsat program. Requests the President to take all appropriate actions to establish and ensure the continuity of the Landsat program. Sets forth guidelines for such actions.
